name: Shortspeech
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: short speech
des:
Funny short speeches for every party. Just ask your Alexa for the random short speech. We have collected about 300 speeches for your fun. Try now and say: 
- Alexa, short speech
- Let us drink for out country

Skill not collect your personal data. No special hardware requirements needed. Please install and enjoy the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
